meanings.definition: The underground part of a plant, consisting of the roots.
meanings.sent1: The sheroots of the tree absorb water and nutrients from the soil.
meanings.sent2: Be sure to water the sheroots of your plants regularly to keep them healthy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the sheroots were secret tunnels to explore.
meanings.sent4: The sheroots of the plant were like hidden fingers gripping the earth tightly.
meanings.sent5: As I dug, the sheroots of the tree seemed to reach out and grab my shovel.

meanings.sent1: She sheroots her beliefs in kindness and compassion.
meanings.sent2: It takes time and effort to sheroot a strong friendship with someone.
meanings.sent3: The team sherooted their bond through shared victories and defeats.
meanings.sent4: His determination sherooted him in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The community sheroots its traditions in the hearts of the younger generation.
